name: Pong Remake (Garnet)
description:
PONG

Game is currently set to always be FIRST TO 5. There are 2 options for gameplay, single player and two player (Local co-op). For single player, there are 3 Difficulty settings for the AI. Each difficulty features their own perks/capabilities.

There may be the occasional occurrence where the game gets cut off on the screen - as far as I can tell, the solution being to zoom out or in the window until the ratio looks correct. This will be something I try to fix in the future so I apologise if there's any inconvenience with this!

1 Player Mode
  • W or Up Arrow = UP
  • S or Down Arrow = DOWN
2 Player Mode
  • Player 1 (Left side of screen):
    • W = UP
    • S = DOWN
  • Player 2 (Right side of screen):
    • Up Arrow = UP
    • Down Arrow = DOWN
Planned additions:
  • Audio
  • Game settings
  • Controls Menu
  • Post-Processing
  • Particles

If there's anything you would like to see in this game, please let me know in the comments!

-Garnet
